adjective.description: Of a person or group of people: unacquainted with letters or literature; illiterate, uneducated.
Having no letters or correspondence; characterized by a lack of post or mail.
Not marked or inscribed with letters; having no letters.

noun.description: Illiterate or uneducated people considered collectively. Now rare.

origin: Late 16th century (in an earlier sense). From letter + -less.
